title: Secrets on the Emerald Coast
description: In this Dateline classic, Marie Carlson, a young mother of two with an adventurous spirit, goes missing. Her relatives can’t shake the feeling that this time, it’s more than just Marie being Marie. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on March 2, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
